header.description: Makes Suspicious Sand/Gravel Easier, and more fun, to see by adding subtle borders. Created by Brorenzo8194 | v0.1
header.name: Visible Suspicious Sand & Gravel

modules.description: Makes Suspicious Sand/Gravel Easier, and more fun, to see by adding subtle borders. Created by Brorenzo8194 | v0.1

subpacks.name: Adds a §eVisual§r border around Suspicious blocks.
Adds an §3AmongUs§r character inside the Suspicious blocks.

settings.text:
§lYou can configure this pack as follows:§r

• §l§gVisual§r: Shows Suspicious Blocks with a visual border around them.
• §l§3AmongSus§r: Shows Suspicious Blocks with AmongUs characters in them.

§7Any updates to the pack can be located on my Github: §bhttps://github.com/Brorenzo
